data.question: What are the three topologically nontrivial structures synthesized in the study?
What method was used for the simultaneous self-assembly of [2]C, TK, and SL?
data.answer: Metal templation and dynamic covalent chemistry (DCC) of imine ligands.

data.question: True or False: The Solomon link (SL) is comprised of three closed loops with five crossings.
What was the yield of the trefoil knot (TK) as a yellowish solid?
True or False: The [2]Catenane ([2]C) was isolated from the solution phase of the reaction.
What ligands were used in the synthesis of [2]C, TK, and SL?
True or False: The Solomon link (SL) was only detected by mass spectrometry and not isolated.
What was the role of zinc ions in the synthesis of [2]C, TK, and SL?
data.answer: Zinc ions were used as a template in the metal templation strategy.

data.question: True or False: The [2]Catenane ([2]C) and the trefoil knot (TK) are both achiral structures.
What was the yield of the [2]Catenane ([2]C) crystals isolated?
True or False: The synthesis of molecular Borromean rings (BRs) used the same ligand system as [2]C, TK, and SL.
What was the temperature and duration for the synthesis reaction of TK?
True or False: The Solomon link (SL) is more thermodynamically stable than the [2]Catenane ([2]C) and the trefoil knot (TK).
What was the main challenge in the preparation of molecular Solomon links (SLs)?
data.answer: Their preparation remains a challenge for chemists due to their complexity.

data.question: True or False: The [2]Catenane ([2]C) and the trefoil knot (TK) were both isolated as solid precipitates.
What was the significance of the dynamic covalent chemistry (DCC) in the synthesis?
data.answer: DCC allowed in situ correction of structural errors, leading to increased yields of thermodynamically stable products.

data.question: What was the role of p–p stacking interactions in the integrity of the complex structures?
data.answer: P–p stacking interactions were crucial to the integrity of the complex structures, facilitating the self-assembly into various topologically nontrivial structures.

data.question: True or False: The synthesis of [2]C, TK, and SL involved the use of irreversible, kinetically controlled link-closing reactions.
What was the main advantage of using a hybrid strategy of metal templation and DCC?
data.answer: The hybrid strategy led to increased yields of thermodynamically stable products in one reaction step.

data.question: True or False: The synthesis of [2]C, TK, and SL was achieved without the detection of oligomers of DAB and DFP in the dynamic library.
